/Jlt6H7I: Failed to fetch models. Please check your API key and API URL.
/Vhh633P: This server requires OAuth authentication to access its tools.
2ovSeFAf: Configure multiple AI bots with different personalities and capabilities.
2xUHUiZk: Optional: Override the service's default model for this agent. Leave empty to use the service default.
4wQOb/5v: Optional: Override the service's default model for this agent. Select from the list or type a custom model name.
5LqJqnVk: Enable the Model Context Protocol (MCP) client to access tools from MCP servers. MCP tools will be available to your Mattermost AI agents.
5cWshZXk: By default some tool use is enabled to allow for features such as integrations with JIRA. Disabling this allows use of models that do not support or are not very good at tool use. Some features will not work without tools.
5pgPNiZ1: Leave empty to use service default
6fa3oXGw: Token budget for extended thinking. Higher values allow deeper reasoning but increase response time and cost. Must be between 1024 and {maxTokens}. Leave blank to use default ({defaultBudget}).
7Rdd0RdA: Enable the built-in Mattermost MCP server that provides AI tools for reading/creating channels, posts, searching content, and managing users and teams. Tools operate with the permissions of the user who invokes them.
8JdTl0YV: Enable Vision to allow the bot to process images. Requires a compatible model.
9ZitBrEU: Controls how much computational effort the model spends on reasoning. Higher effort levels produce more thorough responses but take longer and cost more. Minimal is fastest, High is most thorough.
9nYnvJEv: Failed to create chat channel. Please try again later.
Ac92FquY: Multiple AI services is available on Enterprise plans
AumZfTWZ: Agents are here to help. Choose from the prompts below or write your own.
BcA+p11L: When enabled, AI responses may contain clickable links, including potentially malicious destinations. Enable only if you trust the LLM output and have mitigations for exfiltration risks.
DOw13Xtm: AWS region where Bedrock is available (e.g., us-east-1, us-west-2)
DgGAlfcI: This bot can be a "channel expert" that can consume the contents of a given channel and provide answers only from content available in the channel. Select the channels you would like it to allow below.
EWcxlJmu: Users can chat with this bot and get private assistance about content across all channels the user has access to. Select the users you would like to allow below.
HT6SX7Ez: Failed to fetch models. Please check the service configuration.
HXmpmymI: AI services are third-party services. Mattermost is not responsible for service output.
JoLrkVCC: Sends the Mattermost user ID to the upstream LLM.
JxpWykne: Configure AI services to power your bots.
JyW8AJH6: How long to keep an inactive user connection open before closing it automatically. Lower values save resources, higher values improve response times.
NoM7z5WV: No tools available from this server
Oxv02I9S: IAM user secret access key. Required if AWS Access Key ID is provided. Can also be set via AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY environment variable. System console takes precedence over environment variables.
QZbWuguo: Enter users to allow for this bot
RcC0FwPp: Enable tracing of LLM requests. Outputs full conversation data to the logs.

ULR2DAYE: Would you like to post this summary to the original call thread? You can also ask Agents to make changes.
UOFwNwYM: Comma separated list of hostnames that LLMs are allowed to contact when using tools. Supports wildcards like *.mydomain.com. For instance to allow JIRA tool use to the Mattermost JIRA instance use mattermost.atlassian.net

cAQb5tZd: Use the new OpenAI Responses API with support for reasoning summaries and other advanced features. Disable for legacy Completions API compatibility.
cKCUTjvH: Enable the Mattermost MCP server over HTTP to allow external MCP clients to access Mattermost channels, users, and posts through the MCP protocol. Note: Streaming support requires Mattermost v11.2+.
